name: The Arland Atelier Trilogy
description:
The Arland Atelier Trilogy Plus is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Tecmo Koei Games, which was released in 2015.
Arland Atelier Trilogy Plus is a complete set of Atelier Arland series. This Trilogy includes, -Atelier Rorona : The Alchemist of Arland -Atelier Totori : The Adventurer of Arland -Atelier Meruru : The Apprentice of Arland Explore the world of Arland with enchanting characters and see the whole story of these Archemists.
